description: Ever listen to the radio and wonder what the name of the song is? Who is the artist? What year was it released? Instant FM Music helps you answer all of those questions! Just plug Instant FM Music into your USB Port, tune to your favorite local FM or Web Radio stations and watch as Instant FM Music & the included software not only record the station's entire playlist, but also separate and identify the songs for easy playback. includes: Instant FM Music USB Extension Cable Retractable Antenna CD Containing: Snaptune One - Instant Radio Carrying Pouch Specifications: USB 2.0 and 1.1 Compliant 96 kHz Audio Sample Rate 16 Bit Stereo RDS/RBDS Data Decoder Worldwide FM Band Support (76-108 MHz) Part Number: RDX-155-EF UPC: 7-57887-15513-1 Unit Packaging Dimensions. Height: 10.5 Width: 7.5 Depth: 4.
title: ADS RDX-155-EF Instant FM Music
